title: Gab and Juls: Ronaldo Right to be Upset at Man United?
description:
Gab Marcotti and Julien Laurens discuss Manchester United’s impressive 2-0 victory over Tottenham Hotspur and Cristiano Ronaldo’s decision to leave the game before the full time whistle. The guys also discuss Real Madrid’s 3-0 win over Elche, Neymar’s legal troubles and why a player in Colombia has become a meme.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Ronaldo's frustration at Man United grows; Klopp's messy situation; Neymar's legal troubles
